src_original: dhyānena kleśaviṣkambhaṇam,  prajñayā kleśānuśayasamudghāta iti //  sarvānugrahatāṃ kleśapratipakṣatāṃ copā[dā]yetyaparaḥ paryāyaḥ /
śīlena vighātotpīḍāviheṭhākaraṇenānugṛhṇāti,  yathākramaṃ bhogakāyacittopaghātānupasaṃhārāt /  kṣāntyā vighātotpīḍāviheṭhāmarṣaṇenānugṛhṇāti,  parebhya ātmano bhogādyupaghātasahanāt /
